metadata.title: How Do I Determine the Hysteresis?

sections.content:
Question:
How do I determine the hysteresis?
Answer:
Hysteresis is automatically set to a value of 5% of the threshold.
The hysteresis is set to prevent chattering. By offsetting the threshold after key ON and hysterising from the key OFF to ON, ON to OFF threshold, chattering is prevented.
The noise level differs depending on the customer's board. Please adjust the noise level and evaluate it thoroughly.
Refer to the detail description at following material.
https://renesas.github.io/fsp/group___t_o_u_c_h.html
Suitable Products
RX113
RX130
RX231, RX230
